The image purporting to show an article: Government prepares safe abortion service in line with regulation."
The text in a white box at the bottom of: Abortion Has Been Legalised" and making claims about adultery and feminism.
The misleading post: s caption questioning the leader's intentions and linking the legalization of abortion with the previous legalization of LGBT rights.
The original Republika report: attributed to the Indonesian state news agency Antara, which states that abortion is prohibited in Indonesia and only allowed under certain circumstances such as emergency medical problems or pregnancy due to rape incidents.
